title: Cow Lifeguards
statement:
# Cow Lifeguards

Farmer John has hired N cows as lifeguards, and each cow works a shift on the beach.

## Problem Description

Each lifeguard i works during a shift that covers the time interval from time A_i to time B_i. The beach requires at least one lifeguard to be present at all times during the workday.

Farmer John realizes he hired too many lifeguards and needs to fire exactly one. He wants to maximize the total amount of time that is covered by at least one remaining lifeguard after firing one cow.

Given the shifts of all N lifeguards, determine the maximum amount of time that can be covered if exactly one lifeguard is fired.

## Input Format

The first line contains N, the number of lifeguards.
The next N lines each contain two integers A_i and B_i.

## Output Format

A single integer representing the maximum time covered after firing one lifeguard.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 100
- 0 ≤ A_i < B_i ≤ 1000
